body_html:
I see. That would be great, thanks!

Indeed, double backward any nonlinearity on top of BatchNorm2d can cause this error, probably due to the reentrancy issue. I have validated with BN --> ReLU --> sum.

Indeed, double backward any nonlinearity on top of BatchNorm2d can cause this error, probably due to the reentrancy issue. I have validated with BN --> ReLU --> sum.
body:
I see. That would be great, thanks!

Indeed, double backward any nonlinearity on top of BatchNorm2d can cause this error, probably due to the reentrancy issue. I have validated with BN --> ReLU --> sum.
